TextBlock.Text: MELORAE: Coleus, have you seen our research recorder? According to the <color=orange>photo</color> I took with the camera, we last left it on that high ledge of the chamber, but it is no longer there..
COLEUS: I'm afraid I see no trace of it, Melorae. Perhaps another look in the <color=orange>camera</color> will help us locate it. Wait.. where has the camera..?

MELORAE: The quantum shard's spread over the interior of this tower is becoming more and more rapid.. Come, Coleus. Do not be concerned with the recording - we must address this issue with Plume urgently.
